info.intro: Front-end developer with 2.5 years of commercial experience.Knowledge: React.js, Vue.js, Next.js, Typescript, TailwindCSS, Redux Toolkit, Pinia, Webpack, Vite, Eslint, Prettier. Also, I have:

abilities.first: Ability writing clean, efficient and maintainable code using DRY, KISS, SOLID programming principles.
abilities.second: Experience of implementing responsive designs that work flawlessly on desktop and mobile devices.
abilities.third: Strong problem-solving skills and attention to details.

info.last: I will be glad to cooperate and open to new suggestions!
